medicalRecords.diagnosis: Pituitary adenoma 임상소견 및 병력: 검사명: MRI Pituitary + Angio (C) [Finding] CC: hyperprolactinemia. Tesla: 3T. Contrast obtained MR Sequence T2 PRO TRA | T1 FSE DL SAG 2mm | T2 PRO SAG 2mm | T1 FSE DL COR 2mm | T2 PRO COR 2mm T1 FSE COR Dynamic | T1 FSE DL COR+C 2mm FOV16 | T1 FSE DL SAG+C 2mm FOV16 | FL:B/3D TOF FS new | FL:U/COR | FL:U/RT MCA | FL:U/LT MCA [Conclusion] * Limited evaluation due to artifact. No significant enhancing lesion, left sellar fossa (upto about 3.3mm, Srs 11, Img 11, 12) - Poorly delineation on dynamic study and postcontrast coronal image (but limited evaluation due to motion artifact) ==> R/O pituitary adenoma cannot be excluded. Nonspecific high signal intensities, both WM (mild leukoaraiosis) MRA: Visualization of left inferior petrosal sinus to internal jugular vein. - No definite evidence of communication with arterial branch. ==> R/O venous reflux, more-likely rather than dural AV fistula. Otherwise no definite aneurysm or stenosis 판독의 : 이보은, 이보은 첨부한 사본은 의무기록 원본과 같음을 증명합니다. 3/3 출력자: 신민정 (
